title: Jessu Jordaar
synopsis:
Synopsis
Sometimes we think that we meet people by chance. As we have all heard that marriages are made in heaven and
somewhere, somehow you will bump into that someone special.
This is a romantic comedy about Jessu and Raj, I know it already sounds filmy right? Wait till you hear the rest.
You must be wondering how they met. Well, here you go:
Imagine a girl full on fighting at the airport where the queue is quite a bit. You step in to help her out and somehow get
thrown into this roller coaster with her DISCLAIMER -without the safety belt on!
Happy go lucky, quirky, a chatter box and completely unfiltered, that's Jessu for you. She will take you through a roller
coaster ride and tell you thank you for taking me.
Simple, sincere, introvert and a firm believer in god. Completely opposite of Jessu. Has been heartbroken once and
doesn't plan on that happening again. That's Raj for you.
Raj is suspicious about Jessu and finally he gets the courage and clarifies everything with her.
The motive for which Jessu comes to Mumbai is no more, in which Raj and Jessu get to spend time together.
Slowly Raj falls in love with Jessu, however Jessu reveals to Raj that she has a boyfriend and wants to go back to India and
meet him. She asks Raj to accompany her in which Raj agrees
Once they arrive in India, Jessu is very excited to see her boyfriend. When Jessu goes to see her boyfriend, she finds him
in a situation she never imagined.
Now she wants to take revenge, not in a typical way! Jessu realizes that she's in love with Raj. She confronts him and finds
out Raj is also in love with her, suddenly goons arrive and kidnap them.
What happens after they get kidnapped, is something you have to watch out for!
